episodes.title: NXIVM Cult Survivor Breaks Silence on Keith Raniere's Co-Founder | Sarah Edmondson
episodes.description:
FULL EPISODE: https://youtu.be/gw5nhlRiMB8

A NXIVM survivor breaks down who Nancy and Keith really were before NXIVM — and why, in hindsight, the red flags were everywhere from the very beginning.

SARAH'S LINKS:
IG: https://www.instagram.com/sarahedmondson/?hl=en
X: https://x.com/sarahjedmondson
WEBSITE: https://t.co/7m0F29wrGr
YT: https://www.youtube.com/c/sarahedmondsonactor

Inside this clip:

Nancy’s background as a registered nurse specializing in hypnotism

Keith’s early pattern of manipulating women long before NXIVM

His obsession with MLMs and “business opportunities”

What we actually know about Keith’s relationships prior to NXIVM

The “spiritual wives” who’d been with him since he was 19

LGAT-style training (think Tony Robbins) and how Keith repackaged it

Why Sarah calls Keith a pe*ophile

How Keith “trained” followers to push back against “slander”

The moment Sarah saw a real red flag

NXIVM trainings inside A-list actors’ homes

Gerard Butler being in the room

How often Sarah was flying to Albany HQ

No mythology.
No “self-help” spin.
Just who these people really were behind the curriculum.

***TIMESTAMPS***
00:00 – Nancy Hypnosis, Keith Manipulation, Spiritual Wives
18:01 – Vanguard Week, Christ Image, Moral Weaponizing
28:10 – Harem Building, Fawn Response, Dark Turn
38:34 – MLM Tactics, Dalai Lama, Tourette Claims
48:10 – Bronfman Power, Pseudoscience, Heiress Donations

Full conversation on the Julian Dorey Podcast
@JulianDoreyDaily

episodes.title: Ex-Apple Insider: "Working at Apple Felt Like a Cult..." | Joe Weil
episodes.description:
FULL EPISODE: https://youtu.be/PYcy5ZkLvaw

🚨 What’s it really like behind Apple’s closed doors?

JOE's LINKS:
- UNPLUGGED PHONE: https://unplugged.com/products/up-phone
- IG: https://www.instagram.com/weare_unplugged/

Ex-Apple insider Joe Weil reveals how working inside one of the world’s most powerful companies felt more like being in a cult than a workplace. From rigid internal culture to the obsession with secrecy, Joe pulls back the curtain on what life was like inside Apple — and why he eventually walked away.

Inside this episode:

Why working at Apple felt like joining a cult

How secrecy and control dominate Apple’s culture

The cost of being part of the Apple machine

Why Joe ultimately decided to leave

What this says about Big Tech’s future

⚠️ Apple’s polished brand hides a darker reality — one its insiders rarely talk about.

***TIMESTAMPS***
00:00 – Apple & Third-Party Apps, Erik Prince, Ask App Not to Track, UpPhone Engineers in Israel, Control, Smartphone Ads 5–6x Bigger, Byron Tau Research
13:28 – Data Harvesting, Pegasus, Hardware Kill Switch, Data Wipe, Faster Than the Other Hunter
23:55 – Nothing Is Impenetrable, How Phone Works, User Experience, No Monetization, Open Source, Competing With Apple, Cultural Timing, Apple & Google Fueling China
37:29 – Smartphone Explosion, Workers With Hands, Assembly in America, $100 Hit Per Phone, Worth It
45:00 – CCP Scrutiny, Apple Invested More in China, Tree by Its Fruit, Platforms Blurred
